sub_title: Head of Business Development at Whale Cloud Technology - an Alibaba company
summary: Executive MBA graduate with 10+ years of Commercial career in Sales, Business Development, Corporate Partnership and Global Account Management. Track record of tangible results, business transformations, innovations and sustainable growth. Experienced in major organizations in the Telecommunications, Oil & Gas, FMCG, Retail, Healthcare, Automotive industries. Hands-on inspiring leader with demonstrated ability to influence stakeholders, understand market trends, consumer targets and strong initiative and confidence.

profile_positions.description: Whale Cloud Technology, now part of the giant Alibaba Group, is a leading technology company specializing in telecom software development and delivery, including business support system (BSS), operations support system (OSS), cloud computing, big data analytics, AI-enabled service operations, 5G support system, IoT, smart city solutions, eCommerce, finance and digital transformation consulting services.
profile_positions.title: Global Presales Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Global Sales Account management for one of the world's largest Tier 1 ISPs (Internet Service Provider), consistently ranked as one of the TOP 5 networks globally
- Responsible for identifying and delivering new business opportunities for Layer 2 and Layer 3 connectivity solutions (Latin America and Europe)
- Delivered long-term contracts with Telco/ ISPs for IP transit / Point-to-Point Connectivity/ Colocation / Utility Computing
- Responsible for the long-term growth and strategic development of a portfolio of clients, maintaining a solid base of new prospects.
profile_positions.title: Global Sales Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for delivering new and existing, high value, multi-year corporate partnerships to drive income / donations for Make-A-Wish International and 39+ international affiliates.
- Work closely and cross-functional with Make-A-Wish affiliates developing new corporate contacts/new business leads with focus within Latin America and Europe regions 
- Responsible for the long-term growth and strategic development of a portfolio of partnerships, maintaining a solid base of new business prospects. 
- Help craft and execute effective new business strategies to engage companies in new sponsorships in support of the Foundation. 
- Developed customized business plans for licensing, cause-related marketing, workplace giving and in-kind programs with international corporate clients
- Established relationships with each of the Make-A-Wish affiliates and executive network within the region to coordinate sales activity and target list.
profile_positions.title: Global Corporate Alliances Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Advise on direct and indirect investments in infrastructure assets to institutional end-investors 
- Monitoring asset and risk management
- ESG (GRESB), impact investing (SDG's) and sustainability analysis
profile_positions.title: Infrastructure Capital Consultant (MBA project)

profile_positions.location: Paraná, Santa Catarina e Rio Grande do Sul
profile_positions.description:
Responsible for a fast-paced Commercial expansion and Trade Marketing activities within Paraná, Santa Catarina and Rio Grande do Sul states in Brazil, selling over than 1,500 SKUs (FMCG) to all Ipiranga’s am/pm convenience stores. Experienced in supply chain and logistics (FMCG).

- Leader of a sales force comprised by over 32 sales representatives and 3 supervisors. Implemented sales KPI’s, goals, incentives. 
- Product management of AMPM private label portfolio (FMCG)
- Execution of Communication & Trade activation plans 
- Delivered strong results on standardization of strategic planning, trade strategies such as planograms, category management, sales force training, and ideal portfolio mix;
- Change management and fast business development, expanding territory coverage and penetration to 97%.
- Implemented AMPM's “Automatic Replenishment Solution (SaaS)” to franchisees (AMPM convenience stores)
- P&L management with increased Net Profit
- Pricing specialist (Sell-in / Sell-out)
- Sales forecast planner and business development strategist
- Negotiated commercial agreements and contract discussions with large manufactures (FMCG industry)negotiating pricing and fees, reducing average cost.
- Specialist on small/medium retailers, convenience stores franchise segments.
- Over $100 million in sales, overcoming 100% growth in 2 years
- Record of sales in the first semester of 2018
- Responsible for Promoting and Activating sales campaigns
profile_positions.title: Commercial & Sales Manager

profile_positions.location: São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro, Espírito Santo e Minas Gerais.

profile_positions.title: Commercial & Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the development and expansion of Ipiranga’s downstream sales and activities in the urban market of oil distribution in São Paulo.
- Account management of over 40 gas stations and convenience stores
- Improved retail territory annual margin, overcoming 20% yearly
- Monitored business objectives, staff development, and relevant training opportunities; provided retail support to new business investors
- Identification of new business opportunities within existing clients and direct prospecting for new ones, finding leads, negotiating and closing contracts
- Negotiated and implemented Ipiranga’s automation system (SaaS) for Sales, Payments and Inventory control to gas stations and convenience stores within the territory. 
- Oversaw and led cross-functional projects that resulted in business expansion, increasing the number of gas stations and convenience stores within the territory
- Sales of over than 100 million liters of fuel and overcoming $130 million in revenue yearly. 
- Great experience on resolving conflicts and contracts disputes
- Great experience in franchise management (convenience store channel) and chain expansion (AMPM convenience store, AMPM Bakery, AMPM super store, AMPM station, JET OIL (oil change services), Beer Cave, Wine Cave.
profile_positions.title: Territory Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for Commercial & Technical Coordination of lubricants and greases in the areas of distribution, OEM and After Sales
- In charge of PSA, Renault, Kia Motors, Bosch Service, Carrefour and Porto Seguro after sales accounts, managing sales expansion 
- Direct prospecting of new clients via finding leads, cold calling, negotiating and closing contracts
- Responsible for Trade Marketing strategy and initiatives for After Sales channel, defining targets setting, budgeting, key visual definition, trade guideline creation and roll out with all responsible areas.
- Sell-in /Sell-out and improvement in the sales mix;
- Technical training of lubricants applicability
- Responsible for new business development following TOTAL global marketing strategy, delivering strong results on standardization of strategic planning, Trade Marketing process, annual schedule, budgeting and partnerships.
- Responsible for Promoting and Activating regional and national sales campaigns
- Account Management of 57 ROC stations - Rapid Oil Change
- Execution of activation plans (promotional strategy) applying trade marketing practices

profile_positions.description:

- Organization of events, fairs and congresses, product marketing support, planning and control of the business unit's annual communication budget.
- Responsible for the Internal Communication: management of the Healthcare's incentive campaign and Intranet

profile_positions.description: Control and support to sales platform  (B2Fleet Car and Truck), producing reports and result presentations to the managers, analysis and price composition Sell In and Sell Out, besides sales follow up. Meetings with clients and prospecting for new sales channels. Development of merchandising materials and negotiation with clients.
